Player History
Had first career hit on 4/3/1985, off Steve Bedrosian (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/18/1985, off Frank Viola (CHC)...
Was selected to the 1985 Allstar game...
Won Gold Glove Award at Leftfield in 1985...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/15/1986, hitting .444 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
9/3/1986: Signed a contract extension with Montreal, $9,960,000 per year, for 6 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/1987, hitting .400 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/1988, hitting .667 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 6/24/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Traded from Montreal to Chicago on 5/11/1989 (Going to MON: SS Mark McLemore, P Bobby Thigpen, P Arthur Rhodes, P Jack Morris. Going to CHC: LF Tim Raines)...
Injured on 6/13/1989 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 9 weeks...
